DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate if PD 0332334 affects the pharmacokinetics of lithium by co-administering both drugs to healthy adults.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study To Estimate The Effects Of PD 0332334 On Lithium Pharmacokinetics In Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Additional Study Purpose Details: To investigate potential drug-drug interaction between PD 0332334 and lithium
DOC.criteria: Healthy males and/or females Age from 21 to 55 (inclusive) BMI ranges from 18 to 30 kg/m2 Previous participation in a PD 332334 study Pregnant or nursing females Hypersensitivity (allergic) to lithium, Neurontin (gabapentin), or Lyrica (pregabalin)
